attributes.additional_details: In the North west there is a popular sport called fluffy morris, thousands of dancers compete all year to attend end of season championships, we are all non profit and for most participants and their  families it the only holiday they get each year, I am one of 15 organisations just in Manchester alone with 10 troupes competing, there are hundreds of troupes in the northwest relying on this venue
attributes.background: Anything you can do to keep Pontins Prestatyn from closing

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about closing entertainment venues are a matter for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
